title: Desenvolvimento do site
description: I developed a REST API documented with Swagger, and a frontend that dynamically fetches data and displays a carousel and photo catalog. This personal project, covering design to implementation, has been challenging and enriching, providing valuable lessons. Excited to share more details as I progress.

title: Memory game in JavaScript
description: I developed a memory game using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, where the cards are generated dynamically. The goal is to find all the matching pairs, with logic to flip cards and check for matches, along with smooth animations for an engaging user experience. This project was created during the iFood bootcamp.

title: Jogo Detona Ralph
description: I developed a Wreck-It Ralph game using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, where the objective is to click on Ralph's image before it changes position. The game elements are generated dynamically, and it was created during the iFood bootcamp.

title: .NET Bootcamp Track at DIO
description: I developed a REST API documented with Swagger, including exception handling, built in .NET during the DIO .NET bootcamp.

title: Credit Application in Kotlin
description: Developed during the DIO Kotlin bootcamp, aiming to create a REST API with exception handling and applying unit tests.

title: First Project FullStack
description: I developed my first full-stack project creating a to-do list for activity logging. This project involved development in Java, HTML, CSS, and Angular. It was created during the iFood bootcamp.
